description: Boats in the inner harbour will be unable to access the Irish Sea during the works in October.
title: Douglas inner harbour to shut for flap gate maintenance
title_page: Douglas inner harbour to shut for flap gate maintenance - BBC News
maintext: A watertight enclosure known as a cofferdam will be constructed to allow water to be pumped out of the area before the gate is removed and will remain in place for the duration of the project, preventing vessels from passing by.
